sub_fields.label: SVG Light Colour
sub_fields.name: svg_light
sub_fields.instructions: Use against dark background. RGBA / HEX / etc.

sub_fields.label: SVG Dark Colour
sub_fields.name: svg_dark
sub_fields.instructions: Use against dark background. RGBA / HEX / etc.

sub_fields.label: Text Light Colour
sub_fields.name: text_light
sub_fields.instructions: Use against light background. RGBA / HEX / etc.

sub_fields.label: Text Dark Colour
sub_fields.name: text_dark
sub_fields.instructions: Use against light background. RGBA / HEX / etc.

sub_fields.label: HTML & TEXT Open Wrapper
sub_fields.name: html_text_wrapper_open
sub_fields.instructions: If you wish to wrap BOTH the text and HTML with a wrapper, define it here. (Good for positioning both)

sub_fields.label: HTML & TEXT Close Wrapper
sub_fields.name: html_text_wrapper_close
sub_fields.instructions: Closing of the wrapper. Make sure you close all tags, otherwise HTML will break.

sub_fields.label: HTML
sub_fields.name: html
sub_fields.instructions: These layers will be visible on ALL instances. (Use for buttons, etc...)

sub_fields.label: HTML Layer
sub_fields.name: html_layer
sub_fields.instructions:
{{text_luminance}} will substitute for the text_luminance.
{{svg_luminance}} will substitute for the svg_luminance.
{{background_colour}} will substitute for the background colour.
{{text_luminance_class}} for the colour class. {{text_luminance_class_inv}} for the inverse colour class.

sub_fields.label: SVG Luminance
sub_fields.name: svg_luminance
sub_fields.instructions: Make the SVG Light or Dark with this background

sub_fields.label: Text Luminance
sub_fields.name: text_luminance
sub_fields.instructions: Make the Text Light or Dark with this background

sub_fields.label: Menu Item
sub_fields.name: rotator_menu
sub_fields.instructions: This is the code that will be used in the menu. Usually an A link.

sub_fields.label: Content
sub_fields.name: rotator_content
sub_fields.instructions: This is the content that will be displayed once the menu is selected.

sub_fields.label: Inline CSS
sub_fields.name: css
sub_fields.instructions: This CSS is placed just above the code.

fields.label: AMP Header Tags
fields.name: amp_header_tags
fields.instructions: Add extra header tags into the AMP <head>.

fields.label: Header
fields.name: header
fields.instructions: Add code into the header of the page.

fields.label: Footer
fields.name: footer
fields.instructions: Add code into the footer of the page.

fields.label: Svg Instances
fields.name: svg_instances
fields.instructions: Add SVGs into the footer. Make sure that it is a "symbol" so you can reference it in the page.

fields.label: JSON Export Data
fields.name: json_export_data
fields.instructions: This is the JSON of the builder data

fields.label: JSON Export SVGs
fields.name: json_export_svg
fields.instructions: This is the JSON of the SVGs

fields.label: JSON Import Data
fields.name: json_import_data
fields.instructions:
Paste in JSON from an export file here and click UPDATE. Anything in here will be used to create the Page Builder contents. 
Clear textarea to skip import.

fields.label: JSON Import SVGs
fields.name: json_import_svg
fields.instructions:
Paste in JSON from an export file here and click UPDATE. Anything in here will be used to create the SVG contents. 
Clear textarea to skip import.
